TopicTitle: Put Background Music/Sound Effects in their own thread

Articles.Content: Hi guys, just a quick suggestion.. I noticed the quicker scene changes, much welcome..but still, while doing so, the music stutters (alot) which just gives it a meh "feeling" - could you put the music in it's own independent thread to stop that (as it doesn't have to be threadsafe I think..)

I'd normally process into saying KSP isn't multithreaded so it's not possible, but I'm having some small hesitation because I know the game itself is multithreaded. It would be possible to put music in it's own thread for the game, but I don't know if that would have much of an impact since all threads are being treated as one in the processor. I don't have the knowledge to pull that out, maybe someone else could clarify this.
